title: Ip inaccuracy in store.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I don't know why but I can't use my 4830 IP to buy fizz. 

Pretty sure this is a glitch.

I don't quite know what to say about this but I'm fairly certain that I have enough IP to purchase a new champion to play but the store won't let me. I also can't buy any 4800 Ip champion for the same reason. I can purchase the cheaper champions though, but I want to purchase fizz. Perhaps I will be able to after another game and it's not really a huge issue for me. I just thought I would bring it your attention that the store doesn't see the amount of Ip properly.

replies.body:
This is a bug that occurs in the Beta Client every once in a while. You should be able to resolve this after hopping over to the Legacy Client (from login) to complete the purchase:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this did the trick!
The bug went away after i played a game. Haven't gotten the bug again either and i did end up buying fizz after all.
